title: Wildcard query parser of MultiFieldQueryParser should support boosts
description:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45454710/getwildcardquery-method-of-multifieldqueryparser-doesnt-process-boosts-map-as-g
For some reason getWildcardQuery of MultiFieldQueryParser doesn't handle boosts map as getFieldQuery does. But it'd be great if getWildcardQuery does it as well.

The patch in attachments. Please, check it.
